body: * [Fix warning related to finalizer in docker backend](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/737)

* [Use 'onestatus' to check if services are running on FreeBSD](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/733)
* [Remove Ruby 1.9 from CI and add 2.7 and 3.0](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/734)
* [Remove fallback from checking services to checking processes](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/732)

* [Resolve namespace properly for File](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/730)
* [use localcert for older rubies on appvayor test](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/729)

* [debian: add support for Debian testing and unstable](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/727)
* [Remove Ruby 1.8.7 from .travis.yml](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/728)
* [windows: fix version detection when multiple gem is installed](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/726)

* [ss: fix local_address format for IPv6.](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/722)
* [Windows: fix wrong gem version detection](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/721)

* [Remove strict_host_key_checking option when net-ssh does not support it](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/717)
* [Ensure the matched port is listening](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/716)

* [Fix warning: `&' interpreted as argument prefix](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/704)
* [Fix a constant name inconsistent with its path](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/705)

* [Support user_max/min_days on SLES 11 + Solaris 11](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/683)
* [Use trusty to run tests with ruby 1.8.7 and 1.9.3 on travis](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/684)
* [fix appveyor test](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/682)
* [Output of ss changed in version 4.14; breaks Specinfra::Command::Module::Ss](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/680)
* [Use built-in enabled check in FreeBSD's service command](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/669)
* [Reduce the number of files that ship in the gem artifact](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/666)
* [pin `net-telnet` dependency to keep ruby support for < 2.3](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/665)
* [Use ss for Amazon Linux 2, instead of netstat](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/664)

* [Fix check_is_installed_by_pip regex](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/660)
* [Allow to check if a package is installed by pip3](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/658)
* [Work around for avoid unintentional replacing of lxc configuration](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/656)

* [[CI] Test against new Ruby 2.x versions](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/655)
* [Detect qemu virtualization as well](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/654)

* [support Amazon Linux 2 systemd init system](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/650)
* [Add simple Devuan (devuan.org) support](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/646)
* [Add a very basic set of windows firewall checks](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/645)

* [Allow to test main package version on Alpine Linux](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/640)
* [get_version returns malformed value if the package name contains a hyphen](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/639)
* [Updated suse.rb to detect OS info on SUSE 11 machine](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/638)

* [Add jexec backend to support FreeBSD jail.](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/635)
* [Facter/Ohai support for host_inventory](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/634)

* [fix routing table device column of FreeBSD](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/631)
* [Fix support of FreeBSD interface](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/630)

* [Do not make the powershell pre_command a conditional](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/623)
* [Add support for TCP checks in alpine](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/624)
* [Add ZFS support on FreeBSD](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/621)

* [Fix host_inventory[virtualization][:system] return empty value when is a a docker container](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/620)

* [Enable detect_os helper unit tests.](https://github.com/mizzy/specinfra/pull/617)

name: v2.12.3
body: v2.12.2 is broken, so yanked it and re-rleased.
- [Set logs = true when attaching to Docker backend](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/300)

- [Include other systemd actions and override is_enabled check](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/292)
- [Tiny fixes](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/293)
- [Sort and reverse to avoid `selinux_module' matches`selinux'](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/291)
- [Refactor host inventory](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/290)

- [fix brew get_version](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/282)

- [fix package path for darwin](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/276)
- [Implement bridge resource type for OpenBSD](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/275)
- [removing an unmatched square bracket in the windows file resource](https://github.com/serverspec/specinfra/pull/272)
